Its a great place to call home.

2 car attached garage and a big deck out back for entertaining.
Central Air.
Water Softener.
Septic/Well.
Non-Smoking Unit.
Rent includes trash, and association fees.
Renters insurance req.
Pet negotiable with Nonrefundable fee & additional rent.
Monthly Rent $1895 Security Deposit $2842.50 $300 Cleaning fee $50 Application Fee.
Management Company will require prescreening before scheduling showings without agent.
Requirements: Income must be 2.5X monthly rent Income must be verifiable (w2s, 1099w, check stubs, tax forms)
No evictions, No judgments 5 years Credit Evaluation

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
